data.name: Flower girl 2 - 5 new characters bonus
data.detailed_description:
this game is free to play, and you can fully experience all the plots of one flower demon. Buy DLC to get five new flower monsters, five kinds of happiness waiting for you to explore!

[introduction to the game]


"Flower Girl 2 / Flower Girl 2" is a game of beautiful girls + elimination + plot combination. The story is the story of players stealing holy things - the tears of the flower god to escape from the flower demon country.



◆ super cool elimination play makes you unable to stop.

◆ rich story plot.

◆ exquisite original design.

◆ increase the rhythm click play after the first death, so that you can't stop.

【Character introduction】


Mimosa: Spring

Height: 161cm

Circumference: 95-75-95

Personality: simple, shy, blushing and curious

Representative color: Green

Flower language: repentance and politeness




Carnation: Shio

Height: 165cm

Circumference: 95-75-95

Personality: naive, lovely, cheerful and ignorant

Representative color: white

Flower language: infatuation, difference and love



Lily: Snow

Height: 167CM

Circumference: 90-80-85

Character: noble, proud and charming

Representative color: Pink

Flower language: loyalty, holiness and elegance



Phalaenopsis: Rin

Height: 172cm

Circumference: 75-90-75

Character: fragile and fragile

Representative color: Purple

Flower language: pure love



Rose: Dream

Height: 165cm

Circumference: 75-80-90

Personality: mature and sexy

Representative color: Red

Flower language: encounter by chance



Canna: Aoi

Height: 174CM

Circumference: 90-80-97

Character: IKEA female

Representative color: yellow

Flower language: a bright future

data.short_description: This content needs to have a basic game [flower demon story 2/flower Girl 2] on steam to play. Buy DLC to get five new flower demon plots. More happiness is waiting for you to explore!
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

package_groups.title: Buy Flower girl 2 - 5 new characters bonus

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Sexual Content, General Mature Content

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
